title: Onboarding
description: Flow from mail to next screen

elements.content:
Dear {{ firstName }},

I'm here to help you connect with your colleagues.

 

Ava

title: Statistics
description: Flow which displays statistics about company silos to users

elements.content:
Dear {{ firstName }},

Thank you for taking the time to help me analyze our individual relations and learn more about you.

Based on your feedback I was able to identify our current level of exposure to risk of knowledge silos.

Take a look at where we stand right now, we will work together to break the silos and observe our impact on the trend in the future.
